item.text: Map thumbnails and expressive cursor icons on hover during draft
Added a coin flip animation!
Color Gradient Background
Changelog is generated by an XML file and is now collapsible
Chat box contained in a scroll box
Server now handle upload errors by logging the payload
Minor UI upgrades to various components
Changed Map Pool/Drafting Configuration to Season 4 Rules
Change map pool to Season 3
Integrate with SCL Manager
Reword map choices from ANY Map 3/5 to Map ANY 3/5
Finished implementing playoff draft types
Changed spectator message protocol for easier parsing by 3rd party tools
Changed things around for SCL Season 2
Things are not 100% with playoff/league championship drafting
Fixed bugs with non-regular match being default
Refactor JavaScript code in to its own file
Fixed font loading
Limited usernames to 32 chars
Limited chat messages to 128 chars
Added some style (thanks WarningTrack!)
Switched to pull bootstrap from a CDN
Fixed phrasing for when you select spy order instead of pick order
Added draft mode for Hazard/Championship Matches (thanks sgnurf)
Made room creation/joining form uglier
Give error when user attempts to join room with two players already
Behind the scenes cleanup to make adding tourneys easier in the future

Fixed bug with PICK and ANY with Crowded Pub and New Art Ballroom
